credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: The Hartford Times newspaper clipping
description: Newspaper photograph of Eugenie Prendergast , Mrs. Evan H. Surner, Ira Glackens and Mrs. Glackens in front of painting by William J. Glakens, "Portrait of the Artist's Wife."
